description: Deserted roadside parking in the middle of a deserted area. this space was converted into a picnic and recreation area, it seems to have been abandoned since. flat and shaded ground, ideal for a break or a night.

title: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - Calle Miguel de Unamuno
title_short: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - Calle Miguel de Unamuno

title: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - 22 Calle Miguel de Unamuno
title_short: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes - 22 Calle Miguel de Unamuno
description: It's a nice area for motorhomes, super deluxe. Still a few things to improve. There are no rubbish bins, a cistern for the toilets and a water connection to be filled by hose. The project is financed with European money!

title_short: (13390) Pozo de la Serna - 1 Carretera Infantes P

title: (13300) El Peral - 15D Vía Baños Peral 15

title: (45800) Quintanar de la Orden - 8 Avenida Anselmo Madero
title_short: (45800) Quintanar de la Orden - 8 Avenida Anselmo Madero
description: Free parking lot for spending the night surrounded by houses. Every Wednesday morning there's a street market in the parking lot (forbidden to park during this time). Also from 14th to 20th of August is forbidden to park.

title: (13300) El Peral - CR-6441
description: A little hill with enough space to park a few medium sized vans. At the time of writing this only one other small car was parked here. beautiful view, very quiet and peaceful. no prohibition signs, no amenities. supposedly open 24h. spend one night without any problems. you can hear the highway in the distance. no shade

title: (13320) Villanueva de los Infantes -

title: (13326) Montiel -
description: Quiet and relaxing place in the countryside near the lake. Not overlooked, ideal for lovers of wildlife. Some stable places, otherwise provide holds. gravel / dirt road accessible to all vehicles just after trees coming from Valdepenas!

title: (13326) Montiel - 6 Calle San Blas
description: Side of the dirt road at the end of a town. 100 meters from the main road. Quite place to spend the night with nature around.

title: (45850) La Villa de Don Fadrique - 33A Calle Gibraltar
title_short: (45850) La Villa de Don Fadrique - 33A Calle Gibraltar
description: Free public parking. Quiet zone. Directly opposite there is a free emptying and filling service. Children's play area and very close to bakery and supermarket. On Mondays there is a market right next door and there is a municipal scale for each wallet.
